text: anti-semitism is a virus that mutates I

where a lot of people think

personal that's exactly like the Mafia
say when they're about to shoot you
nothing personal strictly business

personal with the birth of Christianity
and the disappointment of Christians
that Jews did not accept one of their

personal because that was a hatred of

the Antichrist the children of Satan who

that was that was demonic anti Judaism

that was serious because in the end
Christians could work for the conversion

you can't change your race and therefore
all you could do was to god forbid work

afraid the Holocaust was already

and it
accuses Israel of essentially all the
ills that medieval Christians is you

in the universe
70% of Pakistan is in the days following

they've been blamed for more or less
everything and since it's so facto every

that is the new anti-semitism that's
been born in our time it's every bit as

is that Jews must never fight
anti-semitism alone the victim cannot

has become the first country and surely
won't be the last where the fight
against anti-semitism is led by non-jews
well it's led by a parliamentary
committee on anti-semitism people of all
parties who monitor on a regular basis
all forms of anti-semitism that report
is fed back into government which
assembles a an interdepartmental
committee all the departments of
government that have any bearing on it
education health home office and all
that stuff and all of those committees
come together and interface with the
Jewish organizations that deal with the
symptoms of anti-semitism so it is
basically a government-led
activity and in 2009 the British Home
Office and Foreign Office convened for
the first time an international
conference of parliamentarians to fight
against anti-semitism almost all the
participants were not Jewish
and this conference was held and hosted
by the British government the next
government to do so has been the
